name: Finest Roasted Chicken with X'mas Stuffing
description:
Please note that this item will be ready for delivery after two days from order placement due to the special preparation process. Therefore, we kindly request you to select your delivery date accordingly. Thank you!

Minimum delivery weight 1.2kg

This oven roasted chicken is marinated with a range of exotic spices & herbs before it is fully roasted. This gives a unique flavor to the chicken combined with crispy golden skin. Coupled with minced chicken stuffing to completely tantalize your taste buds.
